text: Davide Manuel da Costa Bessa (born 14 January 1985) is a Portuguese football player who plays for Barrosas. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Felgueiras on 6 March 2004 in a game against Chaves. ==References== ==External links== Category:1985 births Category:People from Felgueiras Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:FC Felgueiras players Category:LigaPro players Category:G.D. title: Davide Bessa
